description.narrative: The Promote Women's Leadership Development (WLD) activity is training 25,000 women with a highly acclaimed leadership curriculum. Using FY2017 funds, WLD will train young women in leadership and management skills; life and work skills to boost their self-confidence to enter the workforce and become future leaders; and will award 1,000 scholarships to young girls. WLD will provide participants with the knowledge, skills, and networks they need to enter the upper levels of decision-making in all sectors of society. As women move into decision-making roles, they will be empowered to ensure that their voices are represented in government, business, and social institutions. Afghan women will advocate for an end to gender based violence, countering violent extremism and promoting peace and prosperity. An increased number of Afghan women will advocate for an end to gender based violence, countering violent extremism and promoting peace and prosperity.
